translation.title: Tell us why your appeal is late
translation.appealsShouldBeMadeWithOneMonth: Appeals should be made within one month of the Mandatory Reconsideration Notice being sent.
translation.appealMayGoAheadForGoodReason: Your appeal may still go ahead if there’s a good reason for it being late.
translation.noGoodReasonWhyLate: I don’t have a good reason why my appeal is late

error.msg: Please tell us why your appeal is late
